body_html:
@marcoadurno Thank you so much for pointing that out. You made me realize that I am not using the Dataset API as it is meant to be used, that there is no need for placeholders.
Summaries can be added as you suggested, works like a charm.
body_text:
@marcoadurno Thank you so much for pointing that out. You made me realize that I am not using the Dataset API as it is meant to be used, that there is no need for placeholders.
Summaries can be added as you suggested, works like a charm.
body:
@marcoadurno Thank you so much for pointing that out. You made me realize that I am not using the `Dataset API` as it is meant to be used, that there is no need for placeholders. 
Summaries can be added as you suggested, works like a charm.
